citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at approximately
10:45 am on 01/29/2015. The inspector called two contact numbers and honked the vehicle horn in an attempt to
contact the licensee. All attempts were unsuccessful.
A responsible person shall be available to accompany inspection during business hours.
The report was sent by standard and certified mail.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at approximately
10:45 am on 01/29/2015.  The inspector called two contact numbers and honked the vehicle horn in an attempt to
contact the licensee.  All attempts were unsuccessful.
A responsible person shall be available to accompany inspection during business hours.
The report was sent by standard and certified mail.
